title: Musk PAC Offers $100 to Wisconsin Voters for 'Anti-Activist Judge' Petition
summary: Elon Musk's America PAC launched a controversial campaign offering Wisconsin voters $100 to sign a petition against 'activist judges', directly targeting the April 1 Wisconsin Supreme Court election. The campaign involves a $1 million voter outreach strategy, including $100 per signature and $100 referral bonuses, which prompted a legal challenge from Wisconsin's Attorney General Josh Kaul for potential voter inducement.
description: America PAC, associated with Elon Musk, launched a $1 million voter data collection campaign offering $100 per signature on an anti-'activist judge' petition, targeting the Wisconsin Supreme Court election. The campaign represents a sophisticated voter mobilization and data harvesting strategy that blends political activism with financial incentives.

sources.title: Wisconsin attorney general sues Musk to block his $1 million payment offers to voters
